author: stsp
msg: (svn_cl__cmd_table): In the 'svn patch' help text, mention a neat trick
that allows resolving patch conflicts interactively in some situations.
(who mentioned this trick to me at some point)

author: arkurth
msg: Updated VMware.pm to not make a copy of the vmdk on the host if the VM disk type is local and the image repository is mounted on the VM host. This is done to save space on the host's local disk.

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-254 Index is now either created or appended.
